price: (49) But if the right is theirs, they come to him in prompt obedience.
arabic: وَإِن يَكُن لَّهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ يَأۡتُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِ مُذۡعِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-in yakun lahumu al-ḥaqu yatū ilayhi mudh'ʿinīna
